resources.string: Las Canadas del Teide National Park
If you’re in Tenerife then you inevitably have to visit the Las Cañadas del Teide National Park.

Las Canadas del Teide National Park may be snowy between December and March (as was the case last year before we began our world trip), but that isn't something that's guaranteed across the whole national park.
